nodes.bodyText: Just thinking - this fix will need to go on all branches back into the 2.8 branch, which I think still uses Java 7. Therefore it would be ideal to have the computeIfAbsent method for trunk and 3.x but we will need a patch like this existing one for branch 2.

Okay, I will change the code for your review here. And after this is committed to trunk, I will make a new PR for branch 2, which is like the original code.
